original_text: From thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the service, for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation,
korean_text: 삼십 세부터 오십 세까지 회막 봉사에 참여하여 일할 만한 모든 자라

sentences.original_text: From thirty years old and upward
every one that entereth into the service
for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation
